item.description:
Ristorante Olivio

201 Massachusetts Avenue
Arlington, MA 02474
781-648-2300

At Ristorante Olivio, we bring you the rustic flavors from all regions of Italy. We believe that simplicity, wholesomeness and fresh ingredients are the way to cook and maximize the flavors. All our pasta, desserts and sauces are homemade.

We offer a variety of fresh seafood with daily specials.

Our dessert menu includes fresh cannoli, tirsmisu, panna cotta, lemon ricotta cake, gelato, and more...
item.how_to_find_us: Reservation will be under Baby Boomers

item.name: The January Monthly Dining Venue is Italian
